title: Your face when you pick outside the meta...
body:
...and you're harassed and the lobby is dodged, but you end up on the other team and win with that pick.

http://i.imgur.com/SjcQlxJ.png

replies.body:
new {{champion:82}} mid

http://i.qkme.me/3rxanf.jpg
Why only win? Is picking outside the meta and losing is not allowed? Then how about picking meta and losing?
If someone says you made a bad pick, then you do bad and lose against him for it, you're not going to make that face typically. I'm not sure you quite understood my meaning.
I make that face when I go {{champion:20}} support and I get kicked but end up in another group and we kill them in bot lane... then I roam and help other lanes.
Full attack speed {{champion:201}} . Just try to escape this handsome man.
lol my friend got dumpstered by braum top that shit was so troll
It isn't troll if it dumpstered him now, is it? :3
troll =/= ineffective.

I'm not quite sure what trolling is defined as when it comes to meta, I figured it was stuff like ADC Singed or whatever.

At least attack speed Braum makes sense. He needs it in order to proc his passive by himself (three autos and a Q minimum), making BORK a very nice item on him. Otherwise, you can build bruiser items on him to make him a somewhat effective top laner.
by my definition, troll is referring to anything done just to freaking screw with people or screw around (general screwing).  ex, full atk speed zac, singed in general, etc.

Heh, I see what you mean.

That's why I'm confused. Attack speed Braum top makes sense, since you can build one or two offensive items {{item:3153}} {{item:3091}} (?) and then go full bruiser.
Swain said what I meant.
I don't have braum yet, but I will try it once I get him :3

> [{quoted}](name=VulcanIsHere,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qJaEEQoV,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-09-01T14:16:24.381+0000)
>
> Full attack speed {{champion:201}} . Just try to escape this handsome man.

That strategy has been passed down the Porostrong family for generations!

> [{quoted}](name=EvilMerodach,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qJaEEQoV,comment-id=00050005,timestamp=2015-09-03T14:30:32.886+0000)
>
> That strategy has been passed down the Porostrong family for generations!

thank you for that I needed a good laugh
i played against that top once, i've never fed so hard
who even wants to escape him?
People who messed with Poros. No mercy from Braum when you mess with poros.
but then that begs to question what sick person would mess with poros
{{item:3742}}, {{item:3053}}, {{item:3748}} might be good parts of a top Braum build. It might not. I don't really know

Having gauntlet and mallet at the same time isn't efficient on Braum, due to both being proc'd by autos and slows not stacking. Not to mention Braum can slow with his passive/Q. 

If it were up to me... {{item:3153}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3800}}
I fought a Braum jungle with devourer once....I was not laughing when he went 6/0 .-.
The adc {{champion:103}}. No one ever expects ADC Ahri.
or ADC {{champion:85}}
Yes lets start a new meta. The top tier ADC's will now become Ahri, Kennen, and Malzahar.
dont forget {{champion:10}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:150}}
Or ADC Malzahar.
{{champion:44}} top

"I don't wanna have a teemo mid."

10 minutes later

"I'm getting smashed by a Teemo mid..."
azir in place of an adc tho.

> [{quoted}](name=RottedApples,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qJaEEQoV,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-09-01T15:10:30.887+0000)
>
> azir in place of an adc tho.

I'd laugh at this, but once when I was playing in a ranked team with friends a solo Azir destroyed our 2 bot laners, it would have been funny if it wasn't so sad.
azir has all the things he needs to be a successful carry in bot lane. He's just ap instead of ad.

not quite... something many people dont take into account is the sustain that ADC have, even if it is only a dorans blade and runes it can make a pretty big difference. That is one thing azir does not have access to.
Flask start may help with that. Or sustain support.

I've tried ADC Thresh. He can get poked out easily in lane if he's up against a Cait/Ashe, but late game...
B I G K R 1 T

> [{quoted}](name=WutsKraken,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qJaEEQoV,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-09-01T16:54:16.438+0000)
>
> {{champion:223}} {{item:3931}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}} {{item:1310}} 
> It looks pretty bad. But trust me

Well outside of dev that's how I build tahm. xD I also prefer ninja tabi but to each his/her own. :P

> [{quoted}](name=WutsKraken,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qJaEEQoV,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-09-01T16:54:16.438+0000)
>
> {{champion:223}} {{item:3931}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}} {{item:1310}} 
> It looks pretty bad. But trust me


>:O i didn't know anyone else knew about this build! 
exept i swap out that MR item for frozen mallet so that i can control fights better.
Dead Man's has a conditional slow.  If anything is redundant with Mallet, it's this item, not Spirit Visage.  And Spirit Visage is pretty core because of Tahm's gray health regen.

Or when you get kicked out of a teambuilder lobby and stomp them in game
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BbQ3SrVCMAEThoG.jpg
Ap{{champion:432}} Meeps for days
Runeglaive Bard is one of the most hilarious things in the game.
Haven't tried that actually, i just went nashor's and lich bane as my main items since he has aa burst but I will try that

Jungle Runeglaive Bard works really well due to being able to roam for meeps without needing to leave a lane, having all the AoE, and having his Magical Journey for magical ganks. I think you go Runeglaive -> Nashor's -> other stuff but I'm not sure.

OMFG pls tell me this is a joke! It makes jg bard seem like the best thing since sliced bread. LOL

And you could ult the lanes you're closest too if you couldn't get there in time to help otherwise xP 

{{champion:432}} > {{champion:11}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:120}} etc...

You could ult the enemy turret, E in, Q the enemy, AA a lot, and W in case you or your laner are about to die. Perfect ganks. 

But seriously, I have never tried this, but it sounds so amazing that I really want to. I have convinced myself that it's legit XD
IKR, BRB I'ma go buy my new jungler RQ
Make sure to ward yourself, people are going to invade.
personally i prefer devourer bard jungle but i can say that this works quite well
